title: Ticket #862: type and ver info for java and vm slots missing in condor_status
description:
run condor_status -java or condor_status -vm

Actual results:

condor_status -java: 

slot1@xx [????????] [????] Unclaimed Idle     1.000  1014  0+00:00:04

condor_status -long | grep -i java: 

StarterAbilityList = "HasFileTransfer,HasPerFileEncryption,HasReconnect,HasMPI,HasTDP,HasJobDeferral, HasJICLocalConfig,HasJICLocalStdin,HasJava,HasVM"
JavaVendor = "Sun Microsystems Inc."
JavaVersion = "1.6.0_11"
JavaSpecificationVersion = "1.6"
JavaMFlops = 632.324829
HasJava = TRUE

condor_status -vm: 

slot1@xx [????] [????????] Unclaimed Idle     1.000  [??]  0+03:55:04

condor_status -long | grep HasVM: 

StarterAbilityList = "HasFileTransfer,HasPerFileEncryption,HasReconnect,HasMPI,HasTDP,HasJobDeferral, HasJICLocalConfig,HasJICLocalStdin,HasJava,HasVM"
HasVM = TRUE

Expected results:

As in actual stable version (condor-7.2.2-0.9): 

slot4@xx Sun Micros 1.6.0_ Unclaimed Idle     0.000  2014  0+18:05:23
remarks:
2009-Oct-19 08:49:00 by tstclair:
After Jamie and I had performed our investigation, we had determined that the new projection code for the 7.3 series was the culprit and the data returned from the collector for "said" query does not contain the fields in question.

e.g. -java has no JAVA attribs, and -vm has no VM attribs
attachments:
• 862.txt 1156 bytes added by tstclair on 2009-Oct-19 16:58:28 UTC.
    Patch for fix.
check_ins: 2009-Oct-19 12:03   Check-in [16121]: Ticket #862: needed to add fields to projection list to display condor_status -vm && -java (By Timothy St. Clair )
